c74object.name: gyro.binauralDecoder~
c74object.digest: Decode an ambisonic soundfield to binaural
c74object.description: Decode an ambisonic soundfield to binaural. Use argument to select ambisonic order. Ambisonic order 1 by default.

method.name: subject
method.digest: set the SADIE-I HRTF Database Subject to be used for the binaural decoding
method.description: set the SADIE-I HRTF Database Subject to be used for the binaural decoding.

attribute.name: HRIR Subject
attribute.digest: Select an HRIR Subject to be used for the binaural decoding
attribute.description: Select an HRIR Subject to be used for the binaural decoding. Subject IDs range from 1 to 20.
